name: Road Works
description: Road Works is a new take on the Strategy game genre by indie game developer TaxSoft, inspired by classic City Builder and Business Tycoon video games. You are given a set of factories and are put in charge of maximizing its profits through the construction of carefully planned road networks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or above Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7800 GS, ATI Radeon HD 3650 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 130 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Worst game ever. Tutorial doesn't tell you anything useful and gameplay is really boring.
